error_log <- lapply(list.files('~/tas/data/replicate_1/', full.names=T, pattern = "error"), 
                   function(f) read_tsv(f, col_names=F, col_types = 'cci') %>%
                     `colnames<-`(c('screen', 'well', 'pcount'))) %>% bind_rows()
